item.title: 1820 Productions: Minimal Design, Maximal Motion
item.content:encoded: A detailed behind-the-build on turning a strict minimal brief into a high-end experience through rhythm, transitions, and micro-interactions.

item.title: Jordan Gilroy: From Burnout to Building the Work I Always Wanted
item.content:encoded: How learning to build my own work helped me take back control and fall in love with design again.

item.title: Building an Endless Procedural Snake with Three.js and WebGL
item.content:encoded: A deep dive into building a GPU-enhanced procedural curve system in Three.js, where organic motion emerges from simple steering rules and endless Bézier paths.

item.title: Exo Ape: Crafting Unforgettable Digital Journeys
item.content:encoded: A studio story shaped by narrative, motion, and the belief that digital journeys should feel human.

item.title: Motion Highlights #16
item.content:encoded: A fresh selection of UI animations and motion work from the creative community.

item.title: Making Motion Behave: Inside Vladyslav Penev’s Production-Ready Interaction Systems
item.content:encoded: Vladyslav Penev shares how he builds production-ready motion and layout-driven 3D systems, where CSS, WebGL, and interaction behave as one.

item.title: Building a Scroll-Revealed WebGL Gallery with GSAP, Three.js, Astro and Barba.js
item.content:encoded: Learn how to build a multi-page WebGL image gallery with scroll-triggered shader reveals, smooth scrolling, and seamless page transitions using GSAP, Three.js, Astro, and Barba.js.

item.title: From Art on the Walls to Motion on the Screen: Daniele Buffa’s Approach to Design
item.content:encoded: From discovering design as a teenager to creating award-winning experiences, Daniele Buffa’s journey has been shaped by curiosity, craft, and a lifelong exposure to art.

item.title: WebGPU Gommage Effect: Dissolving MSDF Text into Dust and Petals with Three.js & TSL
item.content:encoded: Build a Three.js WebGPU scene where MSDF text dissolves with a noise-driven TSL shader while synchronized dust and spinning petal particles burst out, finished with selective bloom using MRT.

item.title: 12 Top Web Design Tools and Resources for 2026 – AI and Creative Picks
item.content:encoded: Discover the top 12 web design tools for 2026 – from AI-powered builders to creative resources for designers.
